name: Stonks: The Video Game
description:
Have you ever wanted to be the richest person in the world ? 

How will you react between every dilemma ? 

Win a lot of Money, but be careful, Karma always strikes back.

In STONKS you need to make the more money you can in 60 days.

Invest between multiple holdings, make decisions, and be careful to not become an asshole.

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 52 !
